backend/main.mo: Defines data models and access-controlled CRUD logic for organizations, vendors, pricing plans, activity logs, and user profiles in a Motoko canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Small JSON mapping frontend file paths to brief human-written summaries of their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes using OKLCH values with light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack router, global layout, theme provider, and routes for all micro-app shells and admin pages.
frontend/src/catalog/microAppsCatalog.ts: Exports typed catalog of micro-app metadata including categories, icons, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/CategoryBadge.ts: Renders a category badge styled via category theme colors and icon.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Language switcher using dropdown menu and translation hooks for selecting locales.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity authentication with status handling.
frontend/src/components/MicroAppCard.tsx: Renders a clickable card for a micro app with themed styling and navigation to the app's page.
frontend/src/components/OrgSwitcher.tsx: Dropdown to view and switch the user's active organization, with save and clear actions.
frontend/src/components/PortalLayout.tsx: Top-level layout with header navigation, authentication-aware menus, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter name and email and save their initial profile.
frontend/src/components/RequireRole.tsx: Wrapper enforcing authentication and role-based access, showing alerts when access is denied.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, organizations, roles, admin status, plans, and related backend data via an actor API.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Sets up locale state with Zustand and exposes translation helpers using English and Spanish dictionaries.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.ts: Defines the full English translation dictionary for navigation, pages, common labels, and UI text.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/es.ts: Defines the full Spanish translation dictionary mirroring the English keys and UI sections.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app’s color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard showing organization, vendor, plan, and activity metrics along with recent activity logs, gated by admin access.
frontend/src/pages/MicroAppDirectoryPage: Renders a searchable, filterable micro‑app directory grouped by category using translation and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/AiPromptPla: Mock AI prompt playground that stores prompt-response history and simulates AI replies.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/DaoProposal: Shows mock DAO proposals with voting stats and provides vote buttons for active proposals.
Renders a mock community forum topic list with cards, author avatars, and navigation back to the directory.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/Marketplace: Displays vendor listings based on the user's active organization, handling loading, empty states, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/MessagingIn: Logs activity on load and shows a mock messaging inbox with thread list and placeholder conversation panel.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/MicroAppShe: Loads a micro-app by slug and displays themed app metadata with a placeholder content card.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/SocialFeedS: Logs activity and renders a mock social feed with posts, avatars, and action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/OrganizationManagemen: Page for listing, creating, and joining organizations with dialog-based forms and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/PortalHomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero section, feature highlights, and links to the directory.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPlansPage.tsx: Displays published pricing plans and allows admins to create new plans via a dialog form.
Lists vendors for the user's organization and provides creation and deactivation actions for authorized users.
frontend/src/theme/categoryTheme.ts: Defines color and icon mappings for micro-app categories and exposes a helper to retrieve them.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Exports design tokens including colors, typography, spacing, radii, and shadows for UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, extended theme utilities, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and requirements for an ICP-based portal with modular micro-apps, multi-tenant support, playful UI design, and required icon/hero images.
